title: How to Block a Skype Contact

steps.headline: Right click on the name of the contact you want to block and select "Block this Person"
Click "Block" to confirm this action.
steps.description: You can remove the contact on your list or you can send a report abuse.

steps.headline: You will now see a crossed red circle over their Skype activity cloud.
To unblock: If you ever need to restore this contact as unblocked, simply do the same activity, only this time, click on "unblock".

text: Open Skype and sign in.  Right click on the name of the contact you want to block and select "Block this Person"  Click "Block" to confirm this action. You can remove the contact on your list or you can send a report abuse. You will now see a crossed red circle over their Skype activity cloud.  To unblock: If you ever need to restore this contact as unblocked, simply do the same activity, only this time, click on "unblock". It's as simple as that!
